name: INP-Software
description:
INP-Software is a proven provider of software solutions. Having more than 7 years of experience we have successfully cooperated with American, German, British, Israel, Belgian, French, Russian and other companies. We implement projects for any type of business and deliver a wide range of development services: from product idea to software development and full lifecycle support.
Technologies used by our team are: .NET development (C#, Visual Basic, ASP), Delphi, PHP, C, C++, Visual Basic, Database (MySQL,MSSQL), software development for PDA and other.
